alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 3:38PM EDT until May 06 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Western Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/. * At 338 PM EDT/238 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blountstown, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Greensboro, Bristol, Rock Bluff, Juniper, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Kennys Mill, Hardaway, Nettle Ridge, Sycamore, Frink, Lowry, Hugh Creek and Durham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.
